summary: A test suite that validates the ImageGPT image processor's functionality across multiple image formats and configuration scenarios, including handling of NumPy arrays, 4â€‘channel data, PIL images, PyTorch tensors, loading and saving pretrained configurations, initializing from dictionaries, property access, and JSON serialization.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the image preprocessing pipeline used by ImageGPT models, ensuring it can reliably process diverse image inputs and manage processor configurations for production and research deployments.
